mapper.insert: insert into board values ( board_no_seq.nextval, #{title }, #{content }, #{member_no }, 0, SYSDATE, #{group_no }, #{order_no }, #{depth }, #{fileName } )
mapper.select: select no, title, content, member_no, group_no, order_no, depth, fileName from board where no=#{no }
mapper.update: update board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where no=#{no }
update board set title=#{title }, content=#{content } where no=#{no }
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where title like #{kwd } or content like #{kwd }
select max(order_no) from board where group_no=#{no }

select no, title, member_no, member_name,view_cnt, reg_date, group_no, order_no, depth from (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, no, title, member_no, member_name,view_cnt, reg_date, group_no, order_no, depth FROM ( select a.no no, a.title title, a.content as content, a.member_no member_no, b.name as member_name, a.view_cnt view_cnt, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date, a.group_no group_no, a.order_no order_no, a.depth depth from board a, member b where a.member_no = b.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc, depth asc) where title like #{kwd } or content like #{kwd } ) pagetable where rnum <= #{end }) where rnum >= #{start }
